title: Ticket #202: grid-mapfile can't be located when running as root
description:
since globus 3.something, the locating of the grid-mapfile is performed as follows:

1) if euid is root, $GRIDMAP followed by /etc/grid-security/grid-mapfile

2) if euid is nonroot, $GRIDMAP followed by ~/.gridmap

condor is euid condor when it does the mapping, so never checks in the "normal" location of /etc/grid-security/grid-mapfile but instead looks in ~condor/.gridmap. how this wasn't noticed sooner, i do not know.

i propose we set_root_priv() when calling gss_assist_gridmap().
creator: zmiller
